description.value:
Frequency once per 10 minutes;

Effect The wyrm splatters ink in a @Template[type:cone|distance:10]. Each creature in the area must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.master.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save or become covered in ink.
Ink spray has the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.0qaqksrGGDj74HXE]{Revealing Light} except the creature isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}, and it can remove its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VosLNn2M8S7JH67D]{Blindness} by spending a single action, which has the manipulate trait, to wipe off the ink from their face
